meanings: (좋아하여) like, love, be fond of, be attached to
(유행·의견·규칙 등을) follow, (충고 등을) act (up)on, (formal) heed, (규칙 등을) obey, comply (with), abide by, conform to[with]

vlive.korean: 그 선택에는 반드시 책임과 대가가 따른다. Each choice definitely follows up with responsibility and cost. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : [연애포차 시즌1] - EP.02 같이 일하는 알바생이 눈에 들어온다
vlive.english: Each choice definitely follows up with responsibility and cost.

vlive.korean: 형들이 동생들 말을 따른다. Older members listen to younger members. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [REPLAY]Christmas Week EP.5 B1A4
vlive.english: Older members listen to younger members.

vlive.korean: "큰 힘에는 큰 책임이 따른다". "With great power comes great responsibility". 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - THE BEAT SEASON 4 -10- '이창섭의 힐링 토크 콘서트'
당연하죠. 리더의 말은 무조건 따른다. - 그렇지. Of course. We follow whatever leader says. - That's right. 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 : [FULL] <슈퍼주니어 8집 컴백!> 슈주랑 엘프랑 다시 'PLAY' Super Junior COMEBACK!
vlive.english: Of course. We follow whatever leader says. - That's right.

vlive.korean: 한 잔 따라주시겠습니까? Can you pour me a cup? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Can you pour me a cup?
